  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager
    authenticationManager(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.authentication.configuration.AuthenticationConfiguration config)
    The authenticationManager method returns a bean of AuthenticationManager, which is responsible for authenticating the user.
    org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider
    authenticationProvider()
    The authenticationProvider method returns a bean of DaoAuthenticationProvider, which is used to authenticate the user.
    org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder
    passwordEncoder()
    The passwordEncoder method returns a bean of BCryptPasswordEncoder, which is used to encode the user's password before storing it in the database.
    org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    userDetailsService()
    The userDetailsService method returns a bean of UserDetailsService, which is used to load user-specific data in the application.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ApplicationConfig

      public ApplicationConfig()

  • Methodendetails

    • userDetailsService

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService userDetailsService()
      The userDetailsService method returns a bean of UserDetailsService, which is used to load user-specific data in the application.

    • authenticationProvider

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationProvider authenticationProvider()
      The authenticationProvider method returns a bean of DaoAuthenticationProvider, which is used to authenticate the user. It sets the UserDetailsService and PasswordEncoder to the authProvider. UserDetailsService is used to retrieve user information from the repository, and PasswordEncoder is used to encode the password before comparing it with the stored one. The authentication provider is returned by this method, so it can be used by other parts of the application to authenticate users.

    • authenticationManager

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationManager authenticationManager(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.authentication.configuration.AuthenticationConfiguration config) throws Exception
      The authenticationManager method returns a bean of AuthenticationManager, which is responsible for authenticating the user. This method is used to provide an instance of AuthenticationManager to other parts of the application for authentication purposes.
      Löst aus:
      Exception

    • passwordEncoder

      @Bean public org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder()
      The passwordEncoder method returns a bean of BCryptPasswordEncoder, which is used to encode the user's password before storing it in the database.
